meanings.definition: Enzymes that hydrolyze glycosidic bonds in galactosides.
meanings.sent1: Galactosidases help break down sugars in milk.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study galactosidases to understand how they work.
meanings.sent3: The galactosidases at the dairy farm were always busy breaking down sugars.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like the relentless action of galactosidases on sugar bonds.
meanings.sent5: The galactosidases in the body are like tiny sugar-cutting machines.

meanings.definition: A type of protein that breaks down galactosides.
meanings.sent1: The body needs galactosidases to digest certain foods.
meanings.sent2: Galactosidases play a crucial role in the digestive system.
meanings.sent3: The galactosidases in the stomach were having a party breaking down galactosides.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to fitness was as strong as the action of galactosidases on food.
meanings.sent5: The galactosidases worked tirelessly to break down the galactosides in the meal.

meanings.definition: Substances that aid in the digestion of galactosides.
meanings.sent1: Some foods naturally contain galactosidases to help with digestion.
meanings.sent2: Galactosidases are important for breaking down certain sugars in the body.
meanings.sent3: The galactosidases in the digestive system were like little helpers breaking down sugars.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like the soothing effect of galactosidases on digestion.
meanings.sent5: The galactosidases in the gut work together to break down galactosides efficiently.
